prompts: Create a powerful rock-type Pokemon that has a serpentine form and a fierce expression.
Show me an Onix-inspired Pokemon with shimmering gray scales and piercing red eyes.
Imagine a giant serpent Pokemon that blends seamlessly into rocky terrains with its earthy tones.
Design an evolutionary line for Onix, featuring a sleek, armored final form with crystal accents.
Generate a Pokemon with a massive, twisted body made of stone, perfect for challenging trainers.
Give me a detailed description of a cave-dwelling Pokemon that resembles a giant snake made of boulders.
Make a legendary version of Onix that has glowing crystals and ethereal features.
